author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IONA CONTINUES WESTWARD WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH...
summary: ...IONA CONTINUES WESTWARD WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH... As of 11:00 PM HST Wed Jul 30 the center of Iona was located near 12.3, -166.9 with movement W at 23 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IONA CONTINUES WESTWARD WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH... As of 11:00 PM HST Wed Jul 30 the center of Iona was located near 12.3, -166.9 with movement W at 23 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Iona (CP1/CP012025)
